parameters.command: powershell -Command "$dir='E:/AgentNate/.n8n-instances/test-output'; if(!(Test-Path $dir)){New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dir -Force | Out-Null}; $ts=Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss_fff'; $id=Get-Random -Maximum 99999; $file=Join-Path $dir ('{0}_{1}.txt' -f $ts,$id); Set-Content -Path $file -Value ('Completed at '+(Get-Date -Format o)); Write-Output ('Wrote: ' + $file)"
